medical_history.chief_complaint: Pressure-like diffuse abdominal pain and distention after ERCP.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one day after receiving an ERCP, with diffuse abdominal pain and distention. The pain was relieved by sitting upright. The patient also had an episode of spitting up prior to arrival.
